title: Chandrika Diamond and Pearl Haaram Set - A Timeless Elegance
materials: Cultured South Sea Pearls. Features Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: This exquisite haaram features a delicate filigree design adorned with shimmering brilliant-cut diamonds. Each motif is intricately crafted, showcasing a blend of traditional floral patterns with a modern aesthetic. Lustrous South Sea pearls are gracefully suspended from each pendant, adding a touch of sophistication. The matching earrings echo the necklace's design, creating a cohesive and elegant set.
colors: and iridescent white (pearls). The classic combination exudes warmth and radiance.
occasions: and upscale social gatherings. Also suitable for formal events where you want to make a refined statement.
description: This Chandrika Haaram Set seamlessly blends traditional South Indian design elements with a contemporary flair. The brilliance of the diamonds, combined with the luxurious South Sea pearls, creates a captivating look. Crafted with meticulous attention to detail and Hyderabadi polish, this set is a valuable addition to any jewelry collection. A statement piece that radiates elegance and sophistication.
